description: These Jhumka earrings offer a harmonious blend of traditional craftsmanship and contemporary aesthetics. The Polki Diamonds provide a unique, raw sparkle, while the Emerald adds a touch of regal elegance. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance, making it a valuable addition to your jewelry collection. A perfect embodiment of 'Parampara' (tradition) and 'Adhunikata' (modernity).
